name: WhaleBall
description:
This chill game is currently in-development so please expect bugfixes and content updates on an arbitrary basis.

A relaxed puzzle game where you try to get the highest score you can.

Collect powerups to gain extra score, rewind or pause.

No game over so that you can play howsoever you wish.

Enter Save Codes so that you can play against the same pattern (or beat a friends score)

Inspired by there being countless clones of a classic yet under-rated puzzle game with a great design. The intention of the game is to create a meditative experience with relaxed music, easy-going gameplay and tactile sound effects.
